Title: Modifies the crime of criminal solicitation in the third degree
Summary: Modifies the crime of criminal solicitation in the third degree; provides that a person is guilty of criminal solicitation in the third degree when such person, being over eighteen years of age, with the intent that another person under eighteen years of age engage in conduct that would constitute certain crimes, intentionally provides a loaded firearm to such other person.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to modifying the crime of criminal solicitation in the third degree
